data.text: @JohnnyJenkinsDJ Your best bet is re-registering with your local GP, especially if you don't have plans to move back to university later otherwise you'll have the same problem with your second jab. You can't use the central NHS booking site because the uni GP doesn't use the right platform
@JohnnyJenkinsDJ Think I’ll do the same on Monday! I was so excited before I saw the options they gave me...

@NicoleKarageorg I’ve booked an appointment for now, and going to call GP on Monday to see if they can do anything. But the national 119 service couldn’t help. I’m sure a lot of students are in this situation!
@JohnnyJenkinsDJ I got invited today too and I’m in the exact same situation.
@joe__mander Unfortunately the National service doesn’t think I’m eligible, but my GP does. Their records don’t align 🤯 https://t.co/RCZSBRV6cK
@JohnnyJenkinsDJ I think you can book via the NHS website if you tick to say you’ve been invited for a jab - that should let you choose somewhere near you
@jessslsmith Yep, I’m considering travelling for the appointment but keen to avoid a 200-mile round trip if I can 😬
